DSR_BCR0.description: DMA Status Register / Byte Count Register

DSR_BCR1.description: DMA Status Register / Byte Count Register

DSR_BCR2.description: DMA Status Register / Byte Count Register

DSR_BCR3.description: DMA Status Register / Byte Count Register

EINT.description: Enable Interrupt on Completion of Transfer
Enable Interrupt on Completion of Transfer
Enable Interrupt on Completion of Transfer
Enable Interrupt on Completion of Transfer

DATAL.description: DATAL stores the lower 16 bits of the 16/32 bit CRC

DATALL.description: CRCLL stores the first 8 bits of the 32 bit DATA

DATALU.description: DATALL stores the second 8 bits of the 32 bit CRC

DATAH.description: DATAH stores the high 16 bits of the 16/32 bit CRC

DATAHL.description: DATAHL stores the third 8 bits of the 32 bit CRC

DATAHU.description: DATAHU stores the fourth 8 bits of the 32 bit CRC

GPOLYL.description: POLYL stores the lower 16 bits of the 16/32 bit CRC polynomial value

GPOLYLL.description: POLYLL stores the first 8 bits of the 32 bit CRC

GPOLYLU.description: POLYLL stores the second 8 bits of the 32 bit CRC

GPOLYH.description: POLYH stores the high 16 bits of the 16/32 bit CRC polynomial value

GPOLYHL.description: POLYHL stores the third 8 bits of the 32 bit CRC

GPOLYHU.description: POLYHU stores the fourth 8 bits of the 32 bit CRC

WAS.description: Write CRC Data Register As Seed

FXOR.description: Complement Read Of CRC Data Register

CLPD.description: ADC Plus-Side General Calibration Value Register

CLPS.description: ADC Plus-Side General Calibration Value Register

CLP4.description: ADC Plus-Side General Calibration Value Register

CLP3.description: ADC Plus-Side General Calibration Value Register

CLP2.description: ADC Plus-Side General Calibration Value Register

CLP1.description: ADC Plus-Side General Calibration Value Register

CLP0.description: ADC Plus-Side General Calibration Value Register

CLMD.description: ADC Minus-Side General Calibration Value Register

CLMS.description: ADC Minus-Side General Calibration Value Register

CLM4.description: ADC Minus-Side General Calibration Value Register

CLM3.description: ADC Minus-Side General Calibration Value Register

CLM2.description: ADC Minus-Side General Calibration Value Register

CLM1.description: ADC Minus-Side General Calibration Value Register

CLM0.description: ADC Minus-Side General Calibration Value Register

TPM1CH0SRC.description: TPM1 channel 0 input capture source select

TPM2CH0SRC.description: TPM2 Channel 0 Input Capture Source Select

RXEDGIE.description: RX Input Active Edge Interrupt Enable

RXEDGIF.description: LPUART_RX Pin Active Edge Interrupt Flag

TXDIR.description: LPUART_TX Pin Direction in Single-Wire Mode

R0T0.description: Read receive data buffer 0 or write transmit data buffer 0.

R1T1.description: Read receive data buffer 1 or write transmit data buffer 1.

R2T2.description: Read receive data buffer 2 or write transmit data buffer 2.

R3T3.description: Read receive data buffer 3 or write transmit data buffer 3.

R4T4.description: Read receive data buffer 4 or write transmit data buffer 4.

R5T5.description: Read receive data buffer 5 or write transmit data buffer 5.

R6T6.description: Read receive data buffer 6 or write transmit data buffer 6.

R7T7.description: Read receive data buffer 7 or write transmit data buffer 7.

R8T8.description: Read receive data buffer 8 or write transmit data buffer 8.

R9T9.description: Read receive data buffer 9 or write transmit data buffer 9.

PARITYE.description: The current received dataword contained in DATA[R9:R0] was received with a parity error.

NOISY.description: The current received dataword contained in DATA[R9:R0] was received with noise.

SHIFTBUFBIS%s.description: Shifter Buffer N Bit Swapped Register

SHIFTBUFBYS%s.description: Shifter Buffer N Byte Swapped Register

SHIFTBUFBBS%s.description: Shifter Buffer N Bit Byte Swapped Register

RANGE0.description: External Clock Source Frequency Range Select

LIRC_DIV2.description: Second Low-frequency Internal Reference Clock Divider

FLT.description: I2C Programmable Input Glitch Filter Register

SMB.description: I2C SMBus Control and Status register

SLTH.description: I2C SCL Low Timeout Register High

SLTL.description: I2C SCL Low Timeout Register Low

SSIE.description: I2C Bus Stop or Start Interrupt Enable

CHOPEN.description: Chop oscillator enable. When set, internal chopping operation is enabled and the internal analog offset will be minimized.

SPTEF.description: SPI Transmit Buffer Empty Flag (when FIFO is not supported or not enabled) or SPI transmit FIFO empty flag (when FIFO is supported and enabled)

SPRF.description: SPI Read Buffer Full Flag (when FIFO is not supported or not enabled) or SPI read FIFO FULL flag (when FIFO is supported and enabled)

SPIE.description: SPI Interrupt Enable: for SPRF and MODF (when FIFO is not supported or not enabled) or for read FIFO (when FIFO is supported and enabled)

LVDSC1.description: Low Voltage Detect Status And Control 1 register

LVDSC2.description: Low Voltage Detect Status And Control 2 register

RSTFLTSRW.description: Reset Pin Filter Select in Run and Wait Modes

RSTFLTSS.description: Reset Pin Filter Select in Stop Mode

RSTFLTSEL.description: Reset Pin Filter Bus Clock Select

SSACKERR.description: Sticky Stop Mode Acknowledge Error Reset

ASC.description: Each bit in the ASC field indicates whether there is a corresponding connection to the crossbar switch's slave input port.

AMC.description: Each bit in the AMC field indicates whether there is a corresponding connection to the AXBS master input port.
